name: See the World
description:
See the world. All of it. As cheaply as possible.

Click a square to move the purple marker. Each time you move, the surrounding 8 squares will be revealed. Do this until all the tiles have been revealed, then move home to complete the trip. Each click can be on any square you wish, but there are varying costs:

  • The 4 adjacent squares (up, down, left, right) are cheapest
  • From an airport to an airport is reasonable
  • To a revealed non-adjacent square is expensive
  • To an unrevealed square is very expensive
  • If the destination is water, the move's cost is multiplied

How cheaply can you See the World?

Pre-existing Assets
  • Graphics from Pixabay and the Kenney asset collection
  • Audio from Soniss GameAudioGDC 2018 bundle
  • Thanks to Spry Fox for DarkConfig
